root.name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Soaked!
root.description: OverviewLike many PC games, RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 adds another expansion pack to its library in RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Soaked. This expansion allows you to add water slides, pools, raft rides, body slides, lazy rivers, and more, giving you the ability to create more diverse theme parks. Unlike previous RollerCoaster Tycoon games, all guests can swim.
